Summary: It was a white blimp object just standing still as I was taking my dog for his daily walk.
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was a white blimp up in the sky just standing still with no noise. It wasn't hovering over my house, it was hovering over the other side of the railroad tracks about 300 ft. in the air. I can't explain anymore it was in broad daylight on a sunny day, and I was too busy taking my dog for his daily walk. But I tried to focus on it as much as I could. When I got back to my house, it was already gone. I noticed it, because I frequently look up into the sky to see the beautiful red sky. I just noticed something not moving and it's odd shape. It was not a plane or helicopter. I've never seen anything like it before in my life. I couldn't take any photos of it because I lost my camera for sometime, and plus I was walking my dog.
trends: There have been 148 other sightings in San Antonio
There were no other sightings in San Antonio on or around September 2nd 2007
